data.actual_result: Suggestion `We suggest adding a phone to your 2 factor authentication settings as a backup.` appears
data.expected_result: Suggestion like `We suggest` **`enabling your phone in`** `2 factor authentication settings as a backup.`
data.short_description: Suggestion to add phone to 2FA when it's already added, but SMS Auth not enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Have phone already **added** to 2FA, **but** SMS Auth **not enabled**. - Login to Discord in desktop app or in browser. - Close suggestions like `Need system-wide PTT?` and `Connect Facebook`.
